sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" const LanguageDetails = () => { const { language_id } = useParams() const [language, setLanguage] = useState({}) const loadLanguageDetails = () => { fetch(`http://localhost:5005/api/details/${language_id}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(language => setLanguage(language)) } loadLanguageDetails() return (

Estos son los detalles de {language.name}

{language.yearOfCreation}

{language.currentVersion}

{language.paradigmUsed}

{language.features}

  • {language.pros}

  • {language.cons}

) } export default LanguageDetails
